title: Do we even HAVE a tribunal?

replies.body:
WTF are you on about. 

Reporting this thread.

It's a rather well known fact that the tribunal didn't exist for Oceania and I never heard it was back and was simply asking, here's a post by a red about it:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/reports-how-do-they-work

It's also a rather well known fact that the tribunal doesn't currently exist for **any** server. The reasoning is that Riot is apparently improving it, though those improvements have been "in the works" for quite some time now.

So, there does seem to be an update (albeit vague) on the Tribunal. Apparently it's coming back after the new champ select has been introduced to all the regions.

Source: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/reports-how-do-they-work (Last paragraph)

> [{quoted}](name=MarcSHOT,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=MRhJLd08,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-10T06:29:24.732+0000)
>
> WTF are you on about. 
> 
> Reporting this thread.

Yeah I'm reporting this thread too. As spam.
